[bq="Spatial"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c9b48f6368726c94870000#post_53c9b48f6368726c94870000
CS programs have at least 2 weed-out courses, maybe more depending on how well a student grasps the concepts. It's pretty insane how much final grades get curved.
[/bq]
It's insane cause this class doesn't have a curve.  Someone asked during arrays, "Will this class have a curve to it?" to which the professor said no.  That's literally the point at which pretty much half the class left.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c9b9b363687215de2b0200#post_53c9b9b363687215de2b0200
Masked rider somehow managed to magnify all the problems with power rangers until it was a cancer

Incredibly 90s, Annoying sidekick, Ungodly goofy (The bad kind of goofy) They somehow managed to turn Kamen rider into a show about an Alien trying to adjust to life on earth, And they used Kamen rider ZO and J footage and expected us to buy it
